rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:39 PM, 15 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Nueva Ecija, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Laguna, Batangas and Quezon within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Pampanga(Magalang), Tarlac(Concepcion, San Jose, Mayantoc, Capas, Bamban), Bataan(Bagac) and Cavite(Indang, Trece Martires, General Trias, Dasmarinas, Silang, Naic) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
